class.name: MagixVM
class.description: Handles everything regarding running, batching, rendering and more relating to MagixScripts.

method.name: execute_remaining
method.description: Runs all available MagixScripts. This function resets the counters and then starts executing scripts. This function should be called at the start of a frame, this way scripts that are added during this frame can be later picked up by [method reset_and_execute].

method.name: reset_and_execute
method.description: Runs the MagixScripts which have not run yet this frame. This method should be called at the end of the frame to ensure that every script is running.
